title: 10 year anniversary mystery gift
body:
Hi, I'm not trying to be impatient, but I was wondering: Because I own riot Kayle, when will I get a mystery gift? I received the icon, but nothing else. 
Again, not trying to sound impatient, just curious.

Thanks, Heave

replies.body: There are a lot of accounts that are receiving gifts, so it's going to be a bit before everything is finished rolling out.  Stay up to date through our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as we continue to distribute gifts.  Hang tight!

the gifts are still being distributed, with the 23rd being the final day. If you're absolutely sure you haven't received a mystery gift by then, I'd suggest making a support ticket. #totallydidntcopypaste
